scripts.build:maven: node ./node_modules/.bin/ng build --prod --deploy-url assets/ && npm run build:move
scripts.build:local:prod: ng build --prod --deploy-url assets/ && npm run build:move
scripts.build:local:dev: ng build --deploy-url assets/ && npm run build:move
scripts.clear-contracts-e2e: docker exec -it athena-build_db-server_1 ./cockroach sql --insecure -e "SET DATABASE = helen; DELETE FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 'contractId';"
scripts.clear-users-e2e: docker exec -it athena-build_db-server_1 ./cockroach sql --insecure -e "SET DATABASE = helen; DELETE FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';"
scripts.create-user-e2e: docker exec -it athena-build_db-server_1 ./cockroach sql --insecure -e "SET DATABASE = helen; INSERT INTO users (userid, email, first_name, last_name, name, password, role, consortium_consortiumid, organization_organizationid, last_login) VALUES (999999, 'testlogin@example.com', 'Test', 'User', 'Test User', 'password', 'system_admin', 2, 1, 0);"
scripts.e2e: npm run clear-data-e2e && npm run create-user-e2e && ng e2e --port 49152
scripts.clear-data-e2e: npm run clear-contracts-e2e && npm run clear-users-e2e
